``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - Medial calcaneal tuberosity @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Plantar aponeurosis @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - Flexor retinaculum @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Medial proximal phalanx of 1st toe @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Medial Plantar N.]({{< var ref-medial-plantar-nerve.path >}}) ([S1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s1 >}}), [S2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s2 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **1st MTP**: flexion, abd of first toe @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Longitudinal Arch**: Support @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # MMT
